Package org.jgrapes.core.internal

Class EventProcessor

java.lang.Object
org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Components.IdInfoProvider
public class EventProcessor extends Object implements Runnable
This class provides the default implementation of an EventPipeline.
